page.title: 02A BRINKLOW SCHOOL CHILDS DAY
page.content: My cockerel crows in the morning and wakes me up at 7 o'clock.My goats go bananas because they want to get out of their pen.I have golden porridge for breakfast and after I've got dressed I feed the animals,ducks,hens and goats too.It's pretty hard because they keep butting me.I go to school and read my book and then we have assembly.After that I do my work and then go out to play.I carry on with my work until dinner time and after the last play Mrs.Bond reads us a story.I go home and see if my snails are alright then I change and go outside to play.When it is dark I go to bed with my little brother Joe and the next morning I would say - another hard day.
